verses.verse: Now Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him no <S%H3808><s%> children: and she had an handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Hagar. <S%H1904><s%>

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has restrained <S%H6113><s%> me from bearing: <S%H3205><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, go <S%H935><s%> in to my maid; <S%H8198><s%> it may <S%H194><s%> be that I may obtain <S%H1129><s%> children <S%H1129><s%> by her. And Abram <S%H87><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Sarai. <S%H8297><s%>

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Hagar <S%H1904><s%> her maid <S%H8198><s%> the Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> after <S%H7093><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> had dwelled <S%H3427><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> her to her husband <S%H376><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> to be his wife. <S%H802><s%>

And he went <S%H935><s%> in to Hagar, <S%H1904><s%> and she conceived: <S%H2029><s%> and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had conceived, <S%H2029><s%> her mistress <S%H1404><s%> was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> My wrong <S%H2555><s%> be on you: I have given <S%H5414><s%> my maid <S%H8198><s%> into your bosom; <S%H2436><s%> and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had conceived, <S%H2029><s%> I was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes: <S%H5869><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you.

But Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your maid <S%H8198><s%> is in your hand; <S%H3027><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to her as it pleases <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5869><s%> you. And when Sarai <S%H8297><s%> dealt hardly <S%H6031><s%> with her, she fled <S%H1272><s%> from her face. <S%H6440><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> her by a fountain <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> by the fountain <S%H5869><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Shur. <S%H7793><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Hagar, <S%H1904><s%> Sarai's <S%H8297><s%> maid, <S%H8198><s%> from where <S%H335><s%> <S%H2088><s%> came <S%H935><s%> you? and where <S%H575><s%> will you go? <S%H3212><s%> And she said, <S%H559><s%> I flee <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of my mistress <S%H1404><s%> Sarai. <S%H8297><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, Return <S%H7725><s%> to your mistress, <S%H1404><s%> and submit <S%H6031><s%> yourself under <S%H8478><s%> her hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> exceedingly, <S%H7235><s%> that it shall not be numbered <S%H5608><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are with child <S%H2030><s%>and shall bear <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and shall call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Ishmael; <S%H3458><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> your affliction. <S%H6040><s%>

And he will be a wild <S%H6501><s%> man; <S%H120><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> will be against every <S%H3605><s%> man, and every <S%H3605><s%> man's hand <S%H3027><s%> against him; and he shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of all his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

And she called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that spoke <S%H1696><s%> to her, You God <S%H410><s%> see <S%H7210><s%> me: for she said, <S%H559><s%> Have I also <S%H1571><s%> here <S%H1988><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him that sees <S%H7210><s%> me?

Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Beerlahairoi; <S%H883><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is between <S%H996><s%> Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> and Bered. <S%H1260><s%>

And Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> a son: <S%H1121><s%> and Abram <S%H87><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> his son's <S%H1121><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore, <S%H3205><s%> Ishmael. <S%H3458><s%>
And Abram <S%H87><s%> was fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> when Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> to Abram. <S%H87><s%>
